programs.title: NDS1
programs.description: National Development Strategy 1: A 5-year Medium Term Plan aimed at realising the countryâ€™s Vision 2030, while simultaneously addressing the global aspirations of the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) and Africa Agenda 2063.
programs.focusAreas: Premised on bold and transformative measures, intentional mobilisation of domestic growth vectors, development and capacitation of key national institutions, leveraging Zimbabwe's competitive advantages (natural resources, ecological endowment, skills base)

programs.title: NDS2
programs.achievements: Expected Outcomes: 7% GDP growth, 2 million jobs, halved poverty rate
programs.focusAreas: 15 thematic clusters expanding on NDS1, with emphasis on innovation
